mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(username, password, enabled, course_id) VALUES(#{username}, #{password}, #{enabled}, #{course_id})
mapper.select: SELECT username, password, name, email, profile_photo, course_id, group_id FROM MEMBER m LEFT JOIN GROUP_MEMBER g ON m.username = g.member_name

SELECT m.username, m.password, m.name, m.email, m.profile_photo, course_id, group_id FROM member m LEFT JOIN authorities a ON m.username = a.username LEFT JOIN GROUP_MEMBER g ON m.username = g.member_name WHERE m.course_id = #{course_id} AND a.role = 'student'

SELECT m.username, password, name, email, profile_photo, course_id, group_id, role FROM MEMBER m LEFT JOIN GROUP_MEMBER g ON m.username = g.member_name LEFT JOIN authorities a ON m.username = a.username WHERE m.username = #{username}
